title: Corgi Basketball Round Table Placemats Set of 5, Dog Paw Print Placemats for Dining Table, Table Placemats with Centerpiece Heat Resistant Non-Slip Wedge Place Mats Indoor Outdoor
features: 『Platemats Size』: The plate mat is a set of 5, with 4 wedge-shaped plate mats and 1 center circular platemat. The wedge-shaped table platemats is 11.81 x 11.81 x 17.52 inches, and the diameter of the round plate mat is 15.55 inches. This plate mats can meet your needs in both shape and size. The round table platemats is enough to hold various sizes of pots, bowl and pans, and even used to cushion household appliances, vases, etc., to add more color to your home.

『Durable & Washable』: The platemat is made of high-quality polyester fiber, which is tear-resistant and wear-resistant, washable and durable, and is not easily deformed. The table platemat is an elegant and generous wedge design, suitable for rectangular, round and oval tables, and can be used for any kitchen or dining room decoration.

『Protect & Decorate The Dining Table』: The platemats material is resistant to high temperature, eco-friendly. It can directly contact high-temperature plates and tableware, which perfectly protects your dining table from high temperatures, stains, scratches and liquids. The table round mat is non-slip and firm, so there is no need to worry about food spilling or tipping over. This table mat not only protects the table, but also serves as a decoration on the table.

『Easy to Clean』: The reusable and washable platemats is easy to clean, quick-drying, and does not fade. When there are stains on it, you can wipe it with a damp cloth or rinse with water to save your time. Note that the round table platemats cannot be machine cleaned or bleached.

『Multi-purpose』: The table mat is suitable for birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, housewarming, holidays, patios, parties, family gatherings, weddings, showers and other occasions. It is very suitable for daily use indoors or outdoors.
description: Placemats for dining table set of 5. 4 wedge-shaped plate mats + 1 round centerpiece. 100% polyester fiber material, eco friendly and durable, washable, wear-resistant and heat-resistant, non-slip and easy to clean, protect your table from various stains, scratches and liquids. It is a new look for the dining table and home.

The plate mats is suitable for use as a table mat, a Thanksgiving placemats, a Christmas placemats, a farmhouse placemats and so on. The stylish single-sided printing pattern of the plate mat, with rich colors, adds a warm atmosphere and a sense of fashion to your family.

This durable platemat is very suitable as a gift for your family, dad, mom, boyfriend, friend or colleague who loves cooking or good food. It would be great to give it to them at Christmas, Thanksgiving, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, birthday parties and other holidays or events.
If the dinner table platemats is wrinkled or rolled up, it can be soaked in warm water and then flattened with a heavy object.
